actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE APPSMITH_TESTS.SCHEMATA SET
		COMMENT = '{{update_form.fieldState.COMMENT.isVisible ? update_form.formData.COMMENT : update_form.sourceData.COMMENT}}',
		LAST_ALTERED = '{{update_form.fieldState.LAST_ALTERED.isVisible ? update_form.formData.LAST_ALTERED : update_form.sourceData.LAST_ALTERED}}',
    UNIQUE_ID = '{{update_form.fieldState.UNIQUE_ID.isVisible ? update_form.formData.UNIQUE_ID : update_form.sourceData.UNIQUE_ID}}',
		DEFAULT_CHARACTER_SET_CATALOG = '{{update_form.fieldState.DEFAULT_CHARACTER_SET_CATALOG.isVisible ? update_form.formData.DEFAULT_CHARACTER_SET_CATALOG : update_form.sourceData.DEFAULT_CHARACTER_SET_CATALOG}}',
		ACCOUNT_ORIGIN = '{{update_form.fieldState.ACCOUNT_ORIGIN.isVisible ? update_form.formData.ACCOUNT_ORIGIN : update_form.sourceData.ACCOUNT_ORIGIN}}',
		RETENTION_TIME = '{{update_form.fieldState.RETENTION_TIME.isVisible ? update_form.formData.RETENTION_TIME : update_form.sourceData.RETENTION_TIME}}',
		DELETED = '{{update_form.fieldState.DELETED.isVisible ? update_form.formData.DELETED : update_form.sourceData.DELETED}}',
		CATALOG_ID = '{{update_form.fieldState.CATALOG_ID.isVisible ? update_form.formData.CATALOG_ID : update_form.sourceData.CATALOG_ID}}',
		DEFAULT_CHARACTER_SET_SCHEMA = '{{update_form.fieldState.DEFAULT_CHARACTER_SET_SCHEMA.isVisible ? update_form.formData.DEFAULT_CHARACTER_SET_SCHEMA : update_form.sourceData.DEFAULT_CHARACTER_SET_SCHEMA}}',
		SCHEMA_ID = '{{update_form.fieldState.SCHEMA_ID.isVisible ? update_form.formData.SCHEMA_ID : update_form.sourceData.SCHEMA_ID}}',
		DEFAULT_CHARACTER_SET_NAME = '{{update_form.fieldState.DEFAULT_CHARACTER_SET_NAME.isVisible ? update_form.formData.DEFAULT_CHARACTER_SET_NAME : update_form.sourceData.DEFAULT_CHARACTER_SET_NAME}}'
  WHERE SCHEMA_NAME = {{data_table.selectedRow.SCHEMA_NAME}};
